name: Between | Space
description:
Controls:

[WASD] to move

[Left Click] Hold to drag around pillars(faster in the Between Space)

[Spacebar] to move back and forth from the Between Space(Consumes mana, needs 50% mana to move into the Between Space)

[Right Click] to drop pillars back and forth from the Between Space(This is the only way to squash enemies)

Goal: Take down as many enemies as possible and reach a new High Score!

Made in 48 Hours for the TXGJ
